Sentencas: New energy vehicles are developing rapidly to address energy shortages and global warming.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of the solid oxide fuel cell vehicles using ammonia fuel

Sentencas: However, the onboard hydrogen storage poses certain limitations.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of the solid oxide fuel cell vehicles using ammonia fuel

Sentencas: To solve the limitations, this paper introduced a novel vehicle powered by the ammonia-fueled solid oxide fuel cell (NH3-SOFC), which had the advantages of directly generating electricity and minimizing energy loss.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of the solid oxide fuel cell vehicles using ammonia fuel

Sentencas: The environmental impacts and energy consumption of the NH3-SOFC vehicle (NH3-SOFCV) were evaluated using the life cycle assessment (LCA) method, and the prospects of NH3-SOFCV with the development of sustainable transportation systems were examined.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of the solid oxide fuel cell vehicles using ammonia fuel

Sentencas: The results indicated that the largest impact during the entire life cycle was attributed to the creation of photochemical ozone potential (POCP), which accounted for 62.65% of all calculated impacts.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of the solid oxide fuel cell vehicles using ammonia fuel

Sentencas: The manufacturing phase of NH3-SOFCV utilized the most energy and emitted the most CO2 emissions, followed by the use phase.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of the solid oxide fuel cell vehicles using ammonia fuel

Sentencas: The global warming potential (GWP) of NH3-SOFCV was 0.124 kg CO2-eq/km, while the ammonia fuel utilization in the use phase had an impact on the acidification potential (AP) and eutrophication potential (EP).
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of the solid oxide fuel cell vehicles using ammonia fuel

Sentencas: The sensitivity analysis showed that the total environmental impacts of NH3-SOFCV could be reduced by 29% with the life cycle mileage of 200,000 km, 4 tire changes and 2 battery changes.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of the solid oxide fuel cell vehicles using ammonia fuel

Sentencas: When ammonia fuel was produced from renewable energy sources, the GWP of NH3-SOFCV was less than that of other types of vehicles.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of the solid oxide fuel cell vehicles using ammonia fuel

Sentencas: Overall, NH3-SOFCV had tremendous development potential with the increase of new energy vehicles in the future.
Titulo: Life cycle assessment of the solid oxide fuel cell vehicles using ammonia fuel
